description: Don't pass parameters to internal methods when the value is already accessible through instance variables. Access instance properties directly instead of passing them around unnecessarily.

do.description: Access instance properties directly in internal methods
content: Use self.property_name directly in internal methods
Access instance variables through self
Only pass parameters when they're not available through self
Correct Examples (direct access):
- self._load_render_instructions() instead of self._load_render_instructions(self.behavior.folder)
- self._find_render_folder() instead of self._find_render_folder(self.behavior.folder)
- Direct access: self.behavior.bot_paths instead of passing bot_paths parameter
When Parameters Are Appropriate:
- External API methods that need explicit parameters
- Public methods that are part of the interface
- Methods that need different values than what's in self
- Methods that operate on passed-in data structures
Internal Method Pattern:
- Private methods (_method_name) should use self directly
- Helper methods should access instance state through self
- Only pass parameters for values not in instance state

dont.description: Don't pass instance properties as parameters to internal methods
content: Don't pass self.property as parameter to internal method
Don't extract instance variable just to pass it to another method
Don't pass properties that are already accessible through self
Wrong Examples (unnecessary passing):
- behavior_folder = self.behavior.folder; self._load(behavior_folder)
- bot_paths = self.behavior.bot_paths; self._process(bot_paths)
- working_dir = self.working_dir; self._do_something(working_dir)
Unnecessary Parameter Passing Indicators:
- Variable extracted from self just before method call
- Parameter passed to method that could access self.property directly
- Internal method receives parameter that matches instance property
- Same value passed through multiple method calls
Refactoring Strategies:
- Remove parameter from method signature
- Access property directly through self in method body
- Remove intermediate variable extraction
- Simplify method calls to not pass instance properties
